import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function FooterBanner( { footerBanner: { discount, largeText1, largeText2, saleTime, smalltext, midText, desc, product, buttonText, image}}) { return (

{discount}

{largeText1}

{largeText2}

{saleTime}

{smalltext}

{midText}

{desc}

) }
